name: Beautiful Moon
description:
A narrative experience made puzzle game where you are a cube who wish to reach the moon.

Game made in one day for a Jam about emotions with cubes.

Features:

> The moon
> A cube

Controls:

> W, S, A, D to move
> Space to jump
> E to long...

Credits:

Rafael Álvarez Mateos

Contact:

Feel free to contact me (rafaelalma92@gmail.com) or post a comment with any feedback, bug or suggestion.
